about_the_game:
Wish Creatures

Wish Creatures is a Turn-Based Monster Taming game where monsters leave your party when they "Level Up".

Explore the world of Monstoria and battle monsters with a party of your own! Monsters are known as "Wishlings". As you battle, Wishlings will automatically leave your team to re-enter the Cosmos as a Star. You can wish on a Star to use their signature battle action, known as a "Star Power"! Balance your ever-changing team with Star Power to take down the most powerful foes!

Features

  • Turn monsters into Stars and wish on them in turn-based battles.

  • Explore a vast province of rustic towns, cityscapes, haunted ruins, magical caves, and more to find Wishlings.

  • Recruit Wishlings by hearing what they have to say. Inspire them, and they'll join you!

  • An emotional story. Journey with unlikely allies, battle goofy villains, and find the truth about your neighbor's mysterious monster.

  • Side-activities like the action-based dojo minigame, or the methodical Pulsar Radar that increases the odds of encountering rare Pulsar Wishlings.

  • Two difficulty modes: Chill mode for folks who want to freely experiment with Wishes, and Locked-In mode to start battles with no advantages!
